2016-12-26|2017-01-01.description:
“THE WAR FOR PHANG,” Part Five.

Alana and Marko get their war on.

Note: Image Comics and the creative team behind Saga weren't happy with the quality (too dark) of the initial print for the Dec. 28 release and ordered all retailers to destroy their already received copies. Saga #41 would then be re-released a week later (Jan. 4, 2017).
2016-12-26|2017-01-01.name: The War For Phang Part Five

2016-01-18|2016-01-24.description:
Stirring the Nest

Chapter 13 of Avaiyo, Vol. 03

Heading back to Brosha, Sekken and Iyo meet up with their guild, Emerald Moon. Reunions are cut short as a new crisis emerges that has the means to threaten the entire world. With little time to spare, they depart for Preminx...in hopes of heading off the Dark Legion. With Emerald Moon standing between two armies, it is their hope the Region of Preminx will not be soaked in blood.
2016-01-18|2016-01-24.name: Stirring the Nest

2016-04-04|2016-04-10.description: Rachel and Lilith execute an elaborate plan to get rid of Malus, forever. But Malus has a plan of his own and Rachel is forced to make a terrible choice that could bring her long life to an abrupt end.

2016-04-11|2016-04-17.description:
“Rainbow Dash’s Very Bad Day”

A good day turns bad and Dash can’t shake her bad mood. Before long, it infects all of those around her. What can cure this case of the grumpies?!

List of covers and their creators:

CoverNameCreator(s)Sidebar Location
RegRegular CoverAndy Price1
SubArt Appreciation Subscription CoverAmy Mebberson2
RI1:10 Retailer Incentive CoverSara Richard3
REHot Topic Exclusive Variant CoverTony Fleecs4

Notes:

  • The digital edition (3/30/2016) for this issue was released before the print edition.
  • The Regular cover is a homage of the covers of the Golden Book children's reading books.
  • The Art Appreciation Subscription cover is a homage and a parody of George-Pierre Seurat's painting A Sunday Afternoon on the Island of La Grande Jatte.
2016-04-11|2016-04-17.name: Rainbow Dash’s Very Bad Day

volume.name: My Little Pony: Friendship Is Magic

2016-04-11|2016-04-17.description:
Story Titles

  • Die Kehrseite des Glücks
  • Die Hoteldetektive
  • Die Schatzkammer von König Salomon

2016-04-25|2016-05-01.description: Joker’s Daughter banishes the now magic-less Zatanna and Constantine onto the streets of Nazi-occupied Germany, where they meet a mysterious stranger who might be able to help them, and goes by the name of…Raven.
2016-04-25|2016-05-01.name: Love Stories Part 2 of 3

2016-06-20|2016-06-26.description: America's longest-running magazine of classic comics now has twice as many pages of strips as the earlier version, on better paper, includes 8 pages of full-color comic strips, and features Tarzan by Russ Manning. Color features include Rick O'Shay by Stan Lynde, The Phantom by Wilson McCoy, Flash Gordon by Mac Raboy and Harry Harrison, Gasoline Alley by Dick Moores, Alley Oop by V. T. Hamlin, Casey Ruggles by Warren Tufts, Steve Canyon by Milton Caniff, plus the following stories in black and white: Tarzan by John Celardo, Krazy Kat by George Herriman, Buz Sawyer by Roy Crane, Sir Bagby by R&B Hackney, Modesty Blaise by Peter O'Donnell and Romero.

2016-07-04|2016-07-10.description: Absolute chaos erupts as angry souls turn the quarantine zone against the military. Em and Dana are closing in on Em’s murderer, but General Cale’s assassin stands in their way.

2016-07-25|2016-07-31.description:
76 pages of Astounding Action-Packed Arachnid-Adventure!

The Jean Grey School for Higher Learning has a new teacher… The Amazing Spider-Man!

But will the web-slinger survive the mutant madness that passes for an ordinary day with the X-Men?!!

By Elliott Kalan Marco Failla!

Includes material reprinted from Spider-Man and the X-Men #1-4.

2016-10-10|2016-10-16.deck: Il crepitio del fuoco accompagna le straordinarie storie vissute dagli scout imperiali!
2016-10-10|2016-10-16.description: Continuano gli epici racconti degli scout che, durante l'annuale raduno, narrano ai compagni le loro avventure più incredibili, stupefacenti e pericolose. Quale sarà la drammatica conclusione della storia di Yeraban e Maya? Di quali nuove e terrificanti insidie, nascoste nelle foreste erondariane, verranno a conoscenza Dragonero e i suoi compagni?
2016-10-10|2016-10-16.name: Sentieri smarriti

2016-12-12|2016-12-18.description: It’s hard enough for Scooby and the gang to crack the mystery of a Dickensian Yuletide ghost…but it’s harder with “help” from Mystery, Inc.’s newest member: Harley Quinn!
2016-12-12|2016-12-18.name: Chapter Forty-One
